text:
@realDonaldTrump Sensationalism vs reality! 
HOW MANY AMERICANS WILL DIE FOR YOUR ECONOMY? 
You mismanaged the country, gave to the rich & stole from the poor. You ignored COVID19 to play golf & party instead of preparing for a pandemic. Nat'l debt is out of control. 
Where's the comeback story?
